hero.subtitle: ROTA is the workout app for people who want structure, not chaos. Follow proven programs. Execute with clarity. Progress with purpose.

features.subtitle: Built for focused training. No social feeds, no gamification tricks, no bloat. Just the tools to get stronger.

smartPrograms.title: Smart Programs
smartPrograms.description: Choose from battle-tested programs or let ROTA build one based on your goals, experience, and equipment.

cleanSession.title: Clean Session View
cleanSession.description: Large, tappable buttons. Clear set/rep targets. Automatic rest timers. Zero friction while training.

progressive.title: Progressive Overload
progressive.description: Automatic weight progression based on your performance. Hit your reps? ROTA increases the load.

restTimers.title: Rest Timers
restTimers.description: Configurable rest periods with haptic feedback. Stay focused without watching the clock.

history.title: Workout History
history.description: Every set logged. Every PR tracked. Simple visualizations that show real progress.

offline.title: Offline First
offline.description: Full functionality without internet. Your gym's wifi can stay terrible.
